faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before you start lying.
faq.a1: It's a social deduction game where everyone receives a secret word except one: the Impostor. The goal? Find them before they figure out the word.
faq.q2: Do I need to install anything?
faq.a2: No. The game works directly in your phone, tablet or PC browser. You just need an internet connection.
faq.a3: Yes, 100% free. No hidden purchases. We support the game with non-intrusive ads.
faq.a4: Minimum 4 players are needed for the game to work well. We recommend groups of 4 to 10 people.
faq.a5: Of course! You can use a video call (Zoom, Meet, Discord) to talk and see each other, and use the app to manage cards and voting.
faq.q6: Where can I see the full rules?
faq.a6: You can check all the game rules on our
faq.a6End: . There you'll find detailed explanations on how to play, scoring and tips.
